name: Rakhi Sawant
description: A master motion maker, Krishna can turn your world around. He breathes life into art with his flawless sense of anatomy, perspective, volumes and motion.

name: Krishna Mehta
description: Krishna sketches your dreams into frames. With years of experience in visual storytelling, he ensures every scene hits the mark emotionally and technically.

name: Ayesha Khan
description: Ayesha sculpts digital masterpieces. Her command over form and texture helps bring our ideas to life
